sentence.Network_en: Compared with - star connection MOA, the limiting effect of phase - - phase overvoltage - star connection MOA is better.
sentence.Network_cn: MOA对过电压的抑制效果不受外部电路参数影响,与三星接法 MOA 相比较,四星接法MOA对相 - 相过电压限制效果更好.

sentence.Network_en: MOA are widely used in the electric power system due to their excellent nonlinear characteristics.
sentence.Network_cn: 金属氧化物避雷器(MOA)以其异常优良的非线性特性在电力系统获得了广泛的应用.

sentence.Network_en: Chemical and physical properties of MOA 1 rolling oil base are examined.
sentence.Network_cn: 对MOA1轧制基础油的理化性能进行了检测.

PerfectNetExp.abs: description of on - line detection technique on moa leakage current ., 氧化锌避雷器泄漏电流在线监测技术综述.

虽然一些人认为恐鸟的数量在人类到达前便已经开始减少，不过恐鸟的绝种主要还是认为跟的祖先的猎捕和开垦森林有关。在人类抵达之前，恐鸟的主要猎食者是Harpagornis moorei，世界最大的之一，也绝种了。一度被认为是恐鸟最接近的近缘种，不过在经过的比较后，发现其实恐鸟与的与比较接近。6灭绝原因人们对的灭绝相当熟悉，也相当关心，同样已经灭绝，也同样与“巨”字联在一起的另一种动物似乎很陌生，这种动物就是“恐鸟”(moa)。恐鸟是一种很早以前生活在新西兰的一种无翼大鸟，过去人们一直认为，这种人类已知的最大的鸟

auth_sentence.content: Moa belong to the ratite group in the order Dinornithiformes.
auth_sentence.res_content: Moa belong to the ratite group in the order Dinornithiformes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Moa belong to the ratite group in the order Dinornithiformes.

auth_sentence.content: The nine species of moa were the only wingless birds, lacking even the vestigial wings which all other ratites have.
auth_sentence.res_content: The nine species of moa were the only wingless birds, lacking even the vestigial wings which all other ratites have.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The nine species of moa were the only wingless birds, lacking even the vestigial wings which all other ratites have.

auth_sentence.content: They were also boosted by a new war dance in 1991, the Ma'ulu'ulu Moa replaced by the more aggressive Siva Tau.
